tool.name: AskOmics
tool.description: AskOmics, a visual SPARQL query builder
tool.command:
#import re
## AskOmics configuration, don't change anything here export ASKO_files_dir='/tmp/askomics-ie' && export ASKO_database_path='/tmp/askomics-ie/database.db' && export ASKO_load_url='http://localhost:6543' &&
## Triplestore configuration. Update VIRT_Parameters_NumberOfBuffers and ## VIRT_Parameters_MaxDirtyBuffers according to https://github.com/askomics/askomics-docker-compose/tree/master/virtuoso#configuration export SPARQL_UPDATE='true' && export VIRT_Parameters_NumberOfBuffers='10000' && export VIRT_Parameters_MaxDirtyBuffers='6000' && export VIRT_SPARQL_ResultSetMaxRows='100000' && export VIRT_SPARQL_MaxQueryCostEstimationTime='40000' && export VIRT_SPARQL_MaxQueryExecutionTime='40000' &&
#set link_name = re.sub('[^\w_]', '_', $infile.element_identifier) #if $infile.ext == 'tabular': #set link_name = $link_name + '.tsv' #elif $infile.ext == 'interval': #set link_name = $link_name + '.bed' #else: #set link_name = $link_name + '.' + $infile.ext #end if
mkdir -p /import && ln -s '$infile' '/import/$link_name' &&
bash /start.sh

param.name: infile
param.label: A dataset to load into AskOmics

tool.help: AskOmics is a visual SPARQL query interface supporting both intuitive data integration and querying while shielding the user from most of the technical difficulties underlying RDF and SPARQL.
